SEARCH
Package Model

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
Model.Inventory
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Inventory extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the inventory of a player in the game. It manages the items the player has collected and their coin balance.
See Also:

      public static Inventory loadInventory(String fileName)
      Loads an inventory from a file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file to load the inventory from.
      Returns:
      The loaded inventory, or null if loading fails.

      amount - The number of instances of the item to remove.

      Retrieves a specific item from the inventory based on its type.

      Returns:
      The item with the specified type, or null if not found.

    • isQuestFinished

      public boolean isQuestFinished()
      Checks if a specific quest condition is met based on the current state of the inventory.
      Returns:
      True if the quest condition is met, false otherwise.

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      Checks if the inventory is full (reached its maximum capacity).
      Returns:
      True if the inventory is full, false otherwise.
